#include <iostream>
#include <deque>
using namespace std;

int main() {

	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

	long int n;
	cin>>n;
	while(n!=0){
		long int temp;
		deque<long int> deq;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
			deq.push_back(i);
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){
			deq.pop_front();
			temp=deq[0];
			deq.push_back(temp);
			deq.pop_front();
		}
		cout<<deq[0]<<'\n';
		cin>>n;
	}
	return 0;
}
